snippet.title: Grime 2 - Official Announcement Trailer | gamescom 2023
snippet.description:
Here's your look at the creepy world, gameplay, and terrifying creatures of Grime II in this announcement trailer for the follow-up to the action-adventure Metroidvania from developer Clover Bite. Grime II will be available on PC.

#IGN #Gaming #Grime2
